column4: what will i change to kill the virtual consoles?? im on ubuntu
did you edit the /etc/inittab file?  If so, just reboot.
im on "nano inittab" what will i change here??
do you believe you are not using DMA?  DMA is much faster, and I would assume to be the default unless you had a tricky chipset.  What chipset is on your motherboard?
